data.lyric:
[ti:champagne problems (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]champagne problems (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:07.65]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/William Bowery
[00:15.30]Composed by：Taylor Swift/William Bowery
[00:22.96]You booked the night train for a reason
[00:27.18]So you could sit there in this hurt
[00:34.31]Bustling crowds or silent sleepers
[00:39.20]You're not sure which is worse
[00:43.97]Because I dropped your hand while dancing
[00:47.75]
[00:48.37]Left you out there standing
[00:50.74]Crestfallen on the landing
[00:53.31]Champagne problems
[00:56.32]Your mom's ring in your pocket
[00:59.09]My picture in your wallet
[01:02.04]Your heart was glass I dropped it
[01:04.59]Champagne problems
[01:19.02]You told your family for a reason
[01:23.69]You couldn't keep it in
[01:30.00]Your sister splashed out on the bottle
[01:34.98]Now no one's celebrating
[01:40.85]Dom Perignon you brought it
[01:43.86]No crowd of friends applauded
[01:46.57]Your hometown skeptics called it
[01:49.09]Champagne problems
[01:52.05]You had a speech you're speechless
[01:54.86]Love slipped beyond your reaches
[01:57.54]And I couldn't give a reason
[02:00.28]Champagne problems
[02:25.77]Your Midas touch on the Chevy door
[02:28.61]November flush and your flannel cure
[02:31.25]"This dorm was once a madhouse"
[02:33.44]I made a joke "well it's made for me"
[02:36.00]How evergreen our group of friends
[02:39.81]Don't think we'll say that word again
[02:42.40]And soon they'll have the nerve to deck the halls
[02:46.02]That we once walked through
[02:47.64]One for the money two for the show
[02:50.30]I never was ready so I watch you go
[02:52.96]Sometimes you just don't know the answer
[02:55.90]'Til someone's on their knees and asks you
[02:58.74]"She would've made such a lovely bride
[03:01.34]What a shame she's f**ked in the head "they said
[03:04.27]But you'll find the real thing instead
[03:06.90]She'll patch up your tapestry that I shred
[03:09.94]And hold your hand while dancing
[03:13.35]Never leave you standing
[03:15.85]Crestfallen on the landing
[03:18.65]With champagne problems
[03:21.45]Your mom's ring in your pocket
[03:24.22]Her picture in your wallet
[03:27.05]And you won't remember all my
[03:29.54]Champagne problems
[03:38.34]You won't remember all my
[03:40.68]Champagne problems
data.trans:
[ti:champagne problems (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.65]//
[00:15.30]//
[00:22.96]你定好计划 坐上夜班列车
[00:27.18]所以你才有机会坐在那里伤心难过
[00:34.31]嘈杂的人群 或是安静的熟睡者
[00:39.20]你无法抉择哪里更加让你糟心
[00:44.07]因为我在跳舞的时候 甩开了你的手
[00:48.37]把你丢在那里
[00:50.74]让你垂头丧气
[00:53.31]小事一桩
[00:56.32]你妈妈的戒指在你的口袋里
[00:59.09]我的照片在你的钱包里
[01:02.04]你那颗玻璃做的心 我摔得粉碎
[01:04.59]小事一桩
[01:19.02]你定好计划 提前告知了你的家人
[01:23.69]你没能守住秘密
[01:30.00]你的妹妹借着酒意全都说了出来
[01:34.98]现在没有人有庆祝的心情
[01:40.85]唐·培里侬的香槟 你带来了一瓶
[01:43.86]周围的朋友都不敢鼓掌
[01:46.57]你老家的多疑之人说这对你就是
[01:49.09]小事一桩
[01:52.05]你准备好真情告白 现在却哑口无言
[01:54.93]在你触碰到之前 爱早已消失不见
[01:57.54]而我也无法告知你原因
[02:00.28]小事一桩
[02:25.77]你的点金神手 碰上的是车门而不是石头
[02:28.69]十一月匆匆过去 你又找回了那个风度翩翩的自己
[02:31.25]这间宿舍以前是疯人院
[02:33.44]我开了个玩笑说 专门为我而建
[02:36.00]如何长久相安无事 我们这群朋友
[02:39.81]不要担心我们会旧事重提
[02:42.40]很快他们就会有勇气重新装饰大厅
[02:46.02]我们曾经一同走过那里
[02:47.64]一二三四 做好准备
[02:50.30]我没有准备好 所以只能看着你离去
[02:52.96]有时你只是找不到答案
[02:55.90]直到有人跪在你面前 向你求情
[02:58.74]她本该成为一位可爱的新娘
[03:01.34]多可惜啊 她真是神志不清
[03:04.27]但你会自己找到真正的爱情
[03:06.90]她会缝补好你那被我撕得粉碎的挂毯
[03:09.95]在跳舞时握住你的手
[03:13.35]永远不会把你丢下
[03:15.85]让你垂头丧气地站在那里
[03:18.65]让你为一桩小事而伤心
[03:21.45]你妈妈的戒指在你的口袋里
[03:24.22]她的照片在你的钱包里
[03:27.05]而你不会记得我那些
[03:29.54]不足一提的问题
[03:38.34]你不会记得我那些
[03:40.68]不足一提的问题
